named-query.name: informe.by.auditoria
named-query.query: select o from Informe o where o.auditoria.audId=?1 and o.regActivo=1

named-query.name: actaLectura.by.informe
named-query.query: select o from ActaLectura o where o.informe.infId=?1 and o.regActivo=1

named-query.name: convocatoria.by.informe
named-query.query: select o from Convocatoria o where o.informe.infId=?1 and o.regActivo=1

named-query.name: cartaGerencia.get.all.auditoria.informe
named-query.query: select o from CartaGerencia o where o.informe.infId = ?1 and o.regActivo=1

named-query.name: procedimientos.planificacion.by.auditoria
named-query.query: select o from ProcedimientoPlanificacion o where o.programaPlanificacion.auditoria.audId=?1 and o.regActivo=1

named-query.name: procedimientos.ejecucion.by.auditoria
named-query.query: select o from ProcedimientoEjecucion o where o.programaEjecucion.auditoria.audId=?1 and o.regActivo=1

named-query.name: hallazgos.all.by.auditoria
named-query.query: select distinct o from CedulaNota o left join fetch o.comentarioHallazgos where o.auditoria.audId=?1 and o.regActivo=1

named-query.name: recomendaciones.all.by.cedula
named-query.query: select o from Recomendacion o where o.cedulaNota.cedId=?1 and o.regActivo=1
